common.slogan: We believe that Technical Lead Company (TLC) is about more than delivering cutting-edge Telecom and IT solutions; it's about empowering industries and connecting people through technology.

achievements.mainTitle: We have five years of great experience of various type industries

hero.slogan: We believe that Technical Lead Company (TLC) is about more than delivering cutting-edge Telecom and IT solutions; it's about empowering industries and connecting people through technology.

whoWeAre.title: We Are?
whoWeAre.description: Technical Lead Company (TLC), a proud member of the renowned SYNAMOR Group, is a leading Saudi-based supplier of Telecom and IT solutions, established in 2022. Operating globally, TLC specializes in delivering end-to-end technology solutions and ICT services, including design, integration, and maintenance. With a commitment to innovation and excellence, TLC empowers industries by fostering strong partnerships and leveraging its expertise in cutting-edge technologies.
whoWeAre.subDescription: TLC believes that the success of its operations stems from the dedication and expertise of its employees, which is why the company actively invests in human capital development.

whoWeAre.title: We Are?
whoWeAre.description: Established in 2022, Technical Lead Company (TLC) operates as a subsidiary of SYNAMOR Group, a global leader in telecom and IT solutions since 2010. TLC specializes in delivering cutting-edge technology solutions that empower businesses across diverse industries.

ourLegacy.title: Our Legacy
ourLegacy.description: As part of a global conglomerate, TLC leverages over a decade of expertise to serve clients in Saudi Arabia, UAE, China, and Oman with a reputation for excellence in manufacturing and service delivery.

ourMission.title: Our Mission
ourMission.description: To innovate and provide next-generation telecom and IT solutions that enable our clients to achieve their business goals efficiently.

ourVision.title: Our Vision
ourVision.description: To become a global technology leader renowned for innovation, reliability, and superior customer satisfaction.

Integrity.title: Integrity
Integrity.description: Professional management adhering to high ethical standards.

Innovation.title: Innovation
Innovation.description: Delivering forward-thinking solutions in telecom and IT.

Reliability.title: Reliability
Reliability.description: Long-standing partnerships with global tech leaders.

Local-Manufacturing.title: Local Manufacturing
Local-Manufacturing.description: 5000 mÂ² state-of-the-art manufacturing facility in Saudi Arabia for fiber optics and telecom accessories.

features.feature-1: Integrity, which means communicating honestly and consistently
features.feature-2: Honesty, we agree with reality without distorting the facts
features.feature-3: Self-esteem We expect our employees to earn positive recognition

contactUs.title: We are deeply committed to meeting the needs of our customers.
contactUs.desc: Take a moment to send us your requirements and we will get back to you with a solution.
